record.text:
After reviewing the proposals, I must say they are ambitious! But they hint that we may need to expand the scope of our search. 

@julianfairweather.bsky.social can you call upon contractors in the city to submit proposals? Also, I think we will need to convene Council in 5 days, or so.

record.text:
This is highly irregular since the contract review has technically already begun.

However, I am up to the task! Thank you for trusting me to make wise and thoughtful decisions, exercising judgment and prudence, respecting the sacred Rules and Regulations of the Realm! I shall not disappoint!

Perhaps you missed the Rubrick - there are several volumes bundled together sitting in your mailbox - tethered to your essence, remember? Just utter the summoning spell.

If you need to engage a Great Hall clerk to help arrange them, just let me know!

record.text:
After reviewing the proposals, I must say they are ambitious! But they hint that we may need to expand the scope of our search. 

@julianfairweather.bsky.social can you call upon contractors in the city to submit proposals? Also, I think we will need to convene Council in 5 days, or so.

A Council meeting cannot just be called given a moment's notice! It can take weeks to get word out to Council members - many of whom live abroad.

Also, Prince Farallel should arrive within a week. He will certainly provide support!

Maybe just choose a local builder and move this forward?
